description: React component for a job listing page with search, filters, sorting, and URL synchronization, using local static data.

methods.name: toSearchText
methods.description: Normalizes a value to a lowercase string for search comparison.

methods.name: uniqStrings
methods.description: Returns a list of unique, trimmed, lowercase strings from input values.

methods.name: parseCsvParam
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string into a list of unique strings.

methods.name: stringifyCsvParam
methods.description: Converts a list of strings into a comma-separated string, removing duplicates.

methods.name: JobsPage
methods.description: Main React component for job search/list page with filters, sorting, and URL sync.
